page.title: 18LEISURE,MENZIESHILL,DUNDEE.
page.content: {Menzieshill}has a number of play areas.In these play areas there are swings, climbing frames,roundabouts, chutes etc.etc..There is man who looks after the{play areas. There is a{Salvation Army}meeting house. The children who go draw and read from the Bible. We have a{Community Centre}which caters for all ages. It has the following{clubs,5_9,10-13,14-16}and an O.A.P. club.It also has an annual Gala day.It has snooker tables and a big gym.It also has a snack bar. There is a sports complex being built just down from our school,it will be called the{Lynch Centre} .It will be situated in South Road.It will have,indoor football,badminton,indoor hockey and netball etc,etc.There is a bowlers lounge for the bowlers to use.
